text:
When checking out files from StarTeam via the "stcheckout" task or simply
listing them via "stlist", it would be extremely helpful for Ant to display the
"Content Revision" and/or "Branch Revision" for each file for a given label.  It
would be even more useful for the facility to write this information to a file
as well as (or instead of) STDOUT.  

At present, I'm checking files out against a label, which is okay but it doesn't
allow you to compare which revisions of the files you are using in your build. 
I would like to be able to generate a "what's changed" list in my ear/war/jar
packages, or at least a list of every single file with its content revision
against it.
creator: richard.cross@uk.wanadoo.com
antoine@apache.org
text: starteam ant tasks have been removed starting with Ant 1.8.0
